SELECT fpc.id, fpc.label_code, fpc.code, fpct.name, fpc.description, fpc.organization_id, fpc.display_flag, fpc.built_in_flag, fpc.object_version_number, fpc.sequence FROM fd_project_category JOIN fd_project_category_tl fpct on fpct.id = fpc.id and fpct.lang= #{lang}
WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{code}),'%')
AND ( NAME LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )

SELECT fpc.id FROM fd_project_category fpc WHERE fpc.`CODE` IN
#{code}

SELECT fpc.id, fpc.label_code, fpc.code, fpct.name, fpc.description, fpc.organization_id, fpc.display_flag, fpc.built_in_flag, fpc.object_version_number, fpc.sequence from fd_project_map_category fpmc inner join fd_project_category fpc on fpmc.CATEGORY_ID = fpc.ID JOIN fd_project_category_tl fpct on fpct.id = fpc.id and fpct.lang= #{lang} where fpmc.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
